description:
Keroro`s father drops by to visit, but Mecha Viper R dropped in first!  Can Keroro`s father, the ultimate sergeant, save them from the fate of being bronze statues?  And then the Hinata house starts sinking, thanks to too much secret base digging underground...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Miracle?! Keroro`s Father / Hinata House, Submerge!
ケロロ 奇跡!? ケロロの父 / 日向家沈没
